name: Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon
text: Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon + Ancient Dark Magician + Ancient Blue-Eyes White, This card can only be summoned by fusing the aboce materials using the effect of "Ancient Power Released", Oce per turn quick effect You can discard 1 "burst stream destruction" or 1 "Ancient burst stream destruction" if you do banish all monsters your opponent controls. "Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon" can not attack the turn it uses this effect. This card is uneffected by card effects. Once per turn during your main phase target one card in your opponents hand; banish that card if it was a monster gain life points equal too half that monsters ATK. Once per turn during either players turn (quick effect), of your opponent activates a card or effect you can discard a card from your hand then if you do negate the activation and destroy that card and if you do that this card gains 1000 ATK and DEF. If this card in its owners control leaves the field by an opponents card at the End phase you can banish all cards your opponent controls and if you do Special summon 1 "Ancient" monster from your GY in ATk Position. Your opponent can not activate cards or effects in responce to any of this cards effects.
